mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (NOTC_TP, TITLE, CONTENT, REGR_ID) VALUES (#{notcTp}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regrId})
mapper.select: SELECT NOTC_NO, NOTC_TP, TITLE, CONTENT, REGR_ID, VIEW_CNT, REG_DTTM , UPD_DTTM , START_DTTM ,END_DTTM FROM notice where DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REG_DTTM DESC, NOTC_NO DESC
mapper.sql: SELECT n.NOTC_NO, n.TITLE, n.CONTENT, n.REGR_ID, m.LGIN_ID, n.VIEW_CNT, n.REG_DTTM, n.UPD_DTTM, n.START_DTTM, n.END_DTTM FROM notice n Join member m ON n.REGR_ID = m.MBR_ID
mapper.select: SELECT NOTC_NO, NOTC_TP, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_CNT, REG_DTTM FROM notice ORDER BY REG_DTTM DESC, NOTC_NO DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

choose.otherwise: AND (TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
